archimate:ApplicationInterface.name: Marketplaces
archimate:ApplicationInterface.documentation: In scope of the solution there is E-Shop allowing to sell products configured in solution's Product Catalog. There are also Marketplace use cases- customers able to buy Office 365 product or devices. Here we assume that an external Marketplace solution such as Appdirect can fetch products from the solution's Product Catalog, sell them, and register orders using solution's REST API.
